column1: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can't, You're Right.
The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul.
Today’s Accomplishments Were Yesterday’s Impossibilities.
You Don’t Have To Be Great To Start, But You Have To Start To Be Great.
There's no such thing as lack of time, only lack of focus.
Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
Failure is success in progress.
Chase two rabbits and catch neither
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
You don’t always get what you wish for. But you always get what you work for.
Results happen over time, not overnight. Work hard, stay consistent, and be patient.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
If you want it, you’ll find a way. If you don't, you’ll find an excuse.
If you get tired, learn to rest, not quit.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
Better to light a candle than complain about the darkness
The future depends on what you do today.
You'll never achieve real success unless you like what you're doing.
Be flexible so you can change with change.
Never use a long word where a short one will do.
Chase your passion, not your pension.
The men who have succeeded are men who have chosen one line and stuck to it.
The best way to overcome fears is through practicing positive affirmations.
